titleStmt.title: A True account of a fight between Captain John Leech, commander of the ship Ann of London, of 14 guns and 19 men from Jamaica, and a French privateer of 24 guns and some petteraroes as it came in a letter to his owners from Plymouth, dated the second of this instant January 1689.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
